name: collectionView(_:draggingImageForItemsAt:with:offset:)
desc: Creates and returns a drag image to represent the specified items during a drag.
declaration:
optional func collectionView(_ collectionView: NSCollectionView, 
     draggingImageForItemsAt indexes: IndexSet, 
                        with event: NSEvent, 
                      offset dragImageOffset: NSPointPointer) -> NSImage
